Davis Phinney Foundation

The Davis Phinney Foundation is a patient-led organization that focuses on strategies for improving quality of life. They provide education, tools, and resources for people with PD and their families, empowering them to live well today.

https://davisphinneyfoundation.org/



The American Parkinson Disease Association (APDA)

APDA is a leading grassroots organization dedicated to supporting individuals impacted by PD through education, research, and advocacy. They strive to enhance quality of life for people with PD.

https://www.apdaparkinson.org/



The Michael J. Fox Foundation

MJJF offers resources and support for individuals diagnosed with PD, including free educational resources and opportunities to participate in research studies. They provide practical tips and guidance for navigating PD, from seeing a movement disorder specialist to joining a support group.

https://www.michaeljfox.org/



Parkinson's Buddy Network

Join the Parkinson's Buddy Network, a free online platform connecting individuals within the PD community. The Buddy Network facilitates meaningful connections, resource sharing, and engagement through personal connections, interest-based groups, discussion spaces, and events.

https://parkinsonsbuddynetwork.michaeljfox.org/v2/



Parkinson's Foundation PD Library

The Parkinson's Foundation offers a wide range of resources and support for individuals living with PD, including a helpline, local chapters, and online events. Check out their comprehensive PD library for valuable information.

https://www.parkinson.org/resources-support/pd-library



Parkinson's Foundation Helpline

Staffed by nurses, social workers, and health educators, the Parkinson's Foundation Helpline provides support and information on PD topics such as disease updates, medical issues, referrals, and community resources. Open Monday – Friday, 9 a.m. – 7 p.m., EST. Email support is available at Helpline@Parkinson.org. Call the helpline at 1-800-4PD-INFO (473-4636).

https://www.parkinson.org/resources-support/helpline



Great Speech

Great Speech offers HIPAA-compliant speech therapy online. Get help with communication challenges such as soft speech, slurred speech, and more.

https://greatspeech.com/services/parkinsons-disease/
